llm.feedback:
Up | 12–24 months | AI productivity regime A with adaptable labor markets lifting potential output | Watch for a regime shift if automation exposure >25% and unemployment worsens despite productivity gains, with BoP constraints shaping investment alongside retraining uptake and policy credibility (NL5YYTLF2) | 50%

Up | 0–12 months | AI-enabled wealth/real-asset platforms (Range, Pacaso) and cross‑sector AI adoption (HeartSciences) driving growth | Watch for uptake by high‑net-worth clients, international expansion, and regulatory milestones governing AI/healthcare adoption (UPV3X2MQ6)(ILYC1M41F)(V8TEZOR8R) | 50%

Down | 0–8 weeks | Tariff pass‑through and inflation spillovers to autos | Watch for the timing of tariff announcements and the degree of pass‑through versus absorption that will influence pricing power and risk premia, with auto tariffs cut from 27.5% to 15% as a concrete anchor (S15934PBQ)(WTNT85IPR) | 40%

Down | 6–24 months | Policy tightening or tariff/price shocks driving Regime C, compressing real incomes and shifting capital allocation | Watch for inflation prints, wage growth, and policy guidance that could reprice risk assets, given tariff/inflation shocks as core catalysts (NL5YYTLF2)(YVQU6QCY4) | 40%
